meanings.definition: A device that combines or separates signals on a single transmission line.
meanings.sent1: The diplexer helped merge the different signals into one line.
meanings.sent2: The technician installed the diplexer to manage the signals efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The diplexer was feeling overwhelmed trying to juggle all the signals at once.
meanings.sent4: The diplexer acted like a traffic cop, directing each signal to its destination.
meanings.sent5: With the diplexer in place, the signals flowed smoothly along the transmission line.

meanings.definition: A component used in telecommunications to enable the simultaneous transmission of multiple signals over a single channel.
meanings.sent1: The diplexer allowed the channel to carry many signals at once.
meanings.sent2: Telecommunication companies rely on diplexers for efficient signal transmission.
meanings.sent3: The diplexer threw a party for all the signals passing through the channel.
meanings.sent4: In the world of telecommunications, the diplexer was the ultimate multitasker.
meanings.sent5: Thanks to the diplexer, the channel became a bustling highway of signals.
